Pre-Game Insights: Gleyber Torres and the New York Yankees meet Dansby Swanson and the Chicago Cubs on Saturday at 2:20 p.m. ET, in the second of a three-game series at Wrigley Field.
The favored Yankees have -144 moneyline odds against the underdog Cubs, who are listed at +122.
New York is a 1.5-run favorite (at +120 odds).
The total is 7.5 runs for the matchup.
